refnamediv.refpurpose: Compute the bounding rectangle of a text or a label.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Syntax
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: rect = stringbox( string, x, y, [angle, [fontStyle, [fontSize]]] ) rect = stringbox( Handle )

listitem.para: a 2x4 matrix containing the 4 vertex coordinates of the bounding rectangle.
real scalars, coordinates of the lower left point of strings.
Rotation angle of the string clockwise and in degrees around the (x,y) point.
integer specifying the type of the font.
integer specifying the size of the font.
a graphic handle of Text or Label type.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: stringbox returns the bounding rectangle vertices of a text or label object or a string which will be displayed with a certain way. the coordinates are given with the current graphic scale. the first vertex correspond to the text coordinates (x,y), the lower left point without rotation, the following vertex are given clockwise in the resulting matrix.
The result might not be very accurate with PostScript driver.
